title: Phase 0: Getting the House in Order
body: Laying groundwork: folder structure, scripts, and the decision to build in the open.

title: Phase 1: First Working Feed
body: Hooking up a simple feed reader using React, Vite, and a static JSON file as a stand-in for a real API.

title: Future Phase: Real Backend
body: This slot is reserved for the day a proper API shows up behind this thing.
